q1.question: Do I need to connect my delivery apps directly?
q1.answer: No, you manually enter your income and expenses. This gives you full control and privacy over your data.

q2.question: Can I test for free?
q2.answer: Yes! The Free plan lets you track 1 vehicle and 1 platform. No credit card required.

q3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.

q4.question: What if I use more than one app?
q4.answer: Perfect! Track all your delivery platforms in one place. Compare earnings and see which apps work best for you.

q5.question: How is my data stored and secured?
q5.answer: Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your information with third parties.
